tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE social_media_interactions (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INTEGER,
    post_id INTEGER,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_likes INT,
    post_comments INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_engagement (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    followers_count INT,
    following_count INT,
    date_joined DATE
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES social_media_users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES social_media_users(user_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES social_media_users(user_id),
    post_content TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id INT REFERENCES social_media_users(user_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    likes_count INT
);
